BR_text.BRsummary: Cmd+Q doesn't quit Turi Create Visualization
BR_text.BRdescription:
Affects all keyboard shortcuts that should do something outside the web view, whenever the web view window is focused. Appears to be caused by <denchmark-link:https://github.com/apple/turicreate/pull/1781>#1781</denchmark-link>
 . Now, even the keypresses that should do something, don't. (An exception to this is when the window is not focused but the application is, and then keyboard shortcuts work as expected.)
